commands.talon debug active app:
result = user.talon_get_active_application_info()
print("**** Dumping active application **** ")
print(result)
print("***********************")

commands.git commit highlighted:
edit.copy()
insert("git add ")
edit.paste()
insert("\ngit commit\n")

commands.curse no: app.notify("Please activate the user.mouse_cursor_commands_enable tag to enable this command")

commands.sleep all [<phrase>]:
user.switcher_hide_running()
user.history_disable()
user.homophones_hide()
user.help_hide()
user.mouse_sleep()
speech.disable()
user.engine_sleep()

commands.block comment line:
edit.line_start()
user.code_comment_block_prefix()
key(space)
edit.line_end()
key(space)
user.code_comment_block_suffix()
commands.(line | inline) block comment <user.text:
edit.line_end()
user.code_comment_block_prefix()
key(space)
insert(user.text)
key(space)
user.code_comment_block_suffix()

edit.line_end()
user.code_comment_block_prefix()
key(space)
insert(user.text)
key(space)
user.code_comment_block_suffix()

commands.push brackets:
edit.line_end()
insert("{}")
edit.left()
key(enter)
key(enter)
edit.up()

commands.inner join:
insert("INNER JOIN  ON ")
key(left)
key(left)
key(left)
key(left)

commands.grow window:
user.system_command('i3-msg mode "resize"')
key(right:10)
key(down:10)
key(escape)
sleep(200ms)
user.system_command("i3-msg move position center")
commands.shrink window:
user.system_command('i3-msg mode "resize"')
key(left:10)
key(up:10)
key(escape)
sleep(200ms)
user.system_command("i3-msg move position center")
commands.(shuffle|move (win|window) [to] last por: user.system_command("i3-msg move container to workspace back_and_forth")
commands.next scratch:
user.system_command("i3-msg scratchpad show")
user.system_command("i3-msg scratchpad show")
commands.new scratch (shell|window):
user.i3wm_shell()
sleep(200ms)
user.system_command("i3-msg move scratchpad")
user.system_command("i3-msg scratchpad show")

commands.paste last <user.text> [over]: user.idea("find prev {text}, action EditorRight, action EditorPaste")
commands.paste next <user.text> [over]: user.idea("find next {text}, action EditorRight, action EditorPaste")

commands.(move | next) focus:
app.notify("please use the voice command 'focus next' instead of 'next focus'")
key(ctrl-`)
commands.[next] (section | zone):
app.notify("please use the voice command 'section next' instead of 'next section'")
key(f6)
commands.(previous | last) (section | zone):
app.notify("please use the voice command 'section last' instead of 'last section'")
key(shift-f6)
commands.[next] (element | bit):
app.notify("please use the voice command 'element next' instead of 'next element'")
key(tab)
commands.(previous | last) (element | bit):
app.notify("please use the voice command 'element last' instead of 'last element'")
key(shift-tab)

commands.(move | next) focus:
app.notify("please use the voice command 'focus next' instead of 'next focus'")
key(ctrl-`)
commands.[next] (section | zone):
app.notify("please use the voice command 'section next' instead of 'next section'")
key(f6)
commands.(previous | last) (section | zone):
app.notify("please use the voice command 'section last' instead of 'last section'")
key(shift-f6)
commands.[next] (element | bit):
app.notify("please use the voice command 'element next' instead of 'next element'")
key(tab)
commands.(previous | last) (element | bit):
app.notify("please use the voice command 'element last' instead of 'last element'")
key(shift-tab)

commands.M grid:
app.notify("please use the voice command 'mouse grid' instead of 'm grid'")
user.grid_select_screen(1)
user.grid_activate()

commands.navigate [{user.arrow_key}] [{user.navig: user.navigation(navigation_action or "GO", arrow_key or "RIGHT", navigation_target_name or "DEFAULT", before_or_after or "DEFAULT", navigation_target, ordinals or 1)

commands.phones [<user.ordinals>] word left:
n = ordinals or 1
user.words_left(n - 1)
edit.extend_word_left()
user.homophones_show_selection()
commands.phones [<user.ordinals>] word right:
n = ordinals or 1
user.words_right(n - 1)
edit.extend_word_right()
user.homophones_show_selection()
